additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: INGREDIENTS: Maltodextrin, Cream Powder [Stabilisers (340, 451, 452), Glucose Syrup, Coconut Fatty Acid, Emulsifiers (471, 481, 322(Contains Soy)), Milk Protein, Anticaking Agent (551), Flavouring], Thickener (Tapioca Starch), Croutons (10%) [Wheat Flour, Palm Oil**, Salt, Yeast, Rosemary Extract], Potato Flour, Salt, Sugar, Mushroom Extract, Mineral Salt (508), Onion Powder, Yeast Extract, Flavour Enhancer (635), Mushrooms (0.5%), Natural Flavouring, Sunflower Oil, Chives, Natural Colour (Caramel), Black Pepper, Acidity Regulator (296).

additionalProperty.name: Allergen
additionalProperty.value: Contains SOY, May Be Present EGG, May Be Present TREE NUTS, Contains MILK, May Be Present OTHER TREE NUTS, May Be Present PEANUTS, May Be Present SESAME, May Be Present CEREALS CONTAINING GLUTEN, Contains Wheat, May Be Present SULPHITES

description: Coles Creamy Mushroom with Croutons. Soup in a cup, conveniently ready in 1 minute. Classic creamy mushroom style soup with delicious croutons and chives.
name: Creamy Mushroom With Croutons Serves 2
